doc:
Joan Standing https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joan_Standing 0 Joan Standing (21 June 1903 – 3 February 1979) was an English actress best known for playing Nurse Briggs in the 1931 horror film Dracula. She appeared in 63 films between 1919 and 1940. She was the daughter of Herbert Standing Jr. and granddaughter of Herbert Standing (1846-1923). Her uncles were Wyndham Standing, Sir Guy Standing, Percy Standing and Jack Standing. Her cousin was actress Kay Hammond. Later in life she emigrated to the United States. She died in Houston, Texas in 1979, aged 75. Joan Standing ( 21 June_1903 – 3_February_1979 ) was an_English_actress best_known for playing Nurse_Briggs in the_1931_horror_film_Dracula . She appeared in 63_films between 1919_and_1940 . She was the_daughter of Herbert_Standing_Jr._and_granddaughter of Herbert Standing (_1846-1923_) . Her_uncles were Wyndham_Standing , Sir_Guy Standing , Percy_Standing_and_Jack_Standing . Her_cousin was actress_Kay_Hammond . Later in life she emigrated to the_United_States . She died in Houston , Texas in 1979 , aged 75 .
